mapper.select: SELECT ZJID,YHMC,YHDLZH,YHDLMM,SFZH,JYBH,SSDW_ZJID,XB,LXDH,YDDH, DZYX,YHLX,YHJB,SYBZ,BZ,CJYH,GXYH, JLXZSJ,JLXGSJ,JLSCSJ,JLYXZT from TB_YHXX where ZJID=#{userId}

SELECT A.ZJID,A.YHMC,A.YHDLZH,A.YHDLMM,A.SFZH,A.JYBH,A.SSDW_ZJID,A.XB,A.LXDH,A.YDDH, A.DZYX,A.YHLX,A.YHJB,A.SYBZ,A.BZ,A.CJYH,A.GXYH, A.JLXZSJ,A.JLXGSJ,A.JLSCSJ,A.JLYXZT,B.DWMC FROM TB_YHXX A LEFT JOIN TB_DWXX B ON A.SSDW_ZJID = B.ZJID where a.ZJID=#{zjid}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'MENU_' || V.ZJID AS ID, V.CDMC AS NAME, 'MENU_' || V.SJCD AS PID, V.CDXH AS XH FROM (SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TB_CDXX T1 CONNECT BY PRIOR SJCD = ZJID START WITH ZJID IN (SELECT T2.CDXX_ZJID FROM TB_GNXX T2, TB_JSXX_R_GNXX T3 WHERE T2.ZJID = T3.GNXX_ZJID AND T2.SYBZ = '1' AND T2.JLYXZT = '1' AND T3.JSXX_ZJID IN (SELECT T4.JSXX_ZJID FROM TB_YHXX_R_JSXX T4, TB_JSXX T7 WHERE T4.JSXX_ZJID = T7.ZJID AND T4.YHXX_ZJID = #{userId} AND T7.SYBZ = '1' AND T7.JLYXZT = '1' UNION SELECT T6.JSXX_ZJID FROM TB_YHXX T5, TB_DWXX_R_JSXX T6, TB_JSXX T7 WHERE T5.SSDW_ZJID = T6.DWXX_ZJID AND T6.JSXX_ZJID = T7.ZJID AND T7.SYBZ = '1' AND T7.JLYXZT = '1' AND T5.ZJID = #{userId}))) V WHERE V.SYBZ = '1' AND V.JLYXZT = '1' UNION SELECT V2.CDXX_ZJID AS ID, V2.GNMC AS NAME, 'MENU_' || V2.CDXX_ZJID AS PID, V2.GNXH AS XH FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_GNXX T7, TB_JSXX_R_GNXX T8, TB_CDXX T9 WHERE T7.ZJID = T8.GNXX_ZJID AND T7.CDXX_ZJID = T9.ZJID AND T7.SYBZ = '1' AND T7.JLYXZT = '1' AND T9.SYBZ = '1' AND T9.JLYXZT = '1' AND T8.JSXX_ZJID IN (SELECT T4.JSXX_ZJID FROM TB_YHXX_R_JSXX T4, TB_JSXX T7 WHERE T4.JSXX_ZJID = T7.ZJID AND T4.YHXX_ZJID = #{userId} AND T7.SYBZ = '1' AND T7.JLYXZT = '1' UNION SELECT T6.JSXX_ZJID FROM TB_YHXX T5, TB_DWXX_R_JSXX T6, TB_JSXX T7 WHERE T5.SSDW_ZJID = T6.DWXX_ZJID AND T6.JSXX_ZJID = T7.ZJID AND T7.SYBZ = '1' AND T7.JLYXZT = '1' AND T5.ZJID = #{userId})) V2) ORDER BY XH

SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'MENU_' || V.ZJID AS ID, V.CDMC AS NAME, 'MENU_' || V.SJCD AS PID, V.CDXH AS XH FROM TB_CDXX V WHERE V.SYBZ = '1' AND V.JLYXZT = '1' UNION SELECT V2.CDXX_ZJID AS ID, V2.GNMC AS NAME, 'MENU_' || V2.CDXX_ZJID AS PID, V2.GNXH AS XH FROM TB_GNXX V2 WHERE V2.SYBZ = '1' AND V2.JLYXZT = '1' AND V2.CDXX_ZJID IN (SELECT ZJID FROM TB_CDXX WHERE SYBZ = '1' AND JLYXZT = '1')) ORDER BY XH
